#Lab 5 - Checkpoint 1

### Dados
```{r}
dates <- read_csv("speed-dating.csv")
dates <- na.omit(dates)
dates$attr3_s = as.numeric(as.character(dates$attr3_s))
```

### Perguntas

#### O compartilhamento de hobbies influencia no "gostar"?

```{r}
ggplot(dates, aes(x = shar, y = like)) + 
  geom_jitter(alpha = 0.4, width = 0.2) + geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE)
```

```{r}
mod <- lm(like ~ shar, data = dates)

confint(mod)

tidy(mod, conf.int = TRUE)
glance(mod) 
```

#### O quanto uma pessoa se acha atraente influencia no quanto ela acha outra pessoa atraente?

```{r}
ggplot(dates, aes(x = attr3_s, y = attr)) + 
  geom_jitter(alpha = 0.4, width = 0.2) + geom_smooth(method = "lm")

mod <- lm(attr ~ attr3_s, data = dates)

summary(mod)
confint(mod)

tidy(mod, conf.int = TRUE)
glance(mod) 
```
